segments.text: Good morning , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to settle my bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly sir . May I have your room key , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a moment , please . I'll draw up your bill for you ... Thank you for waiting , sir . Your bill totals two thousand six hundred and fifty-eight yuan , including the phone and laundry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That much ! Would you mind letting me have a look at it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all , sir . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Well , It seems to be right . How much is that in dollars , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment , sir . I'll calculate that for you . It comes to 305 dollars and 52 cents at today's exchange rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How would you like to make the payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In cash , please . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir ... Here is your change . Could you check it , please ? Thank you for choosing our hotel . I hope you enjoyed your stay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , please forward my mail to this address .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , sir . We hope you have a good trip .
segments.speaker: S1
